params.amount_: The amount of deposit tokens to withdraw and receive native ETH

devdoc.title: Helper contract to easily support native tokens (e.g. ETH/AVAX) as collateral

deposit(address).notice: deposits NATIVE_TOKEN as collateral using native. A corresponding amount of the deposit token is minted.

sweep(address,address,uint256).notice: ERC20 recovery in case of stuck tokens due direct transfers to the contract address.

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: withdraws the NATIVE_TOKEN deposit of msg.sender.
